channel.title: How to private message other users
channel.description:
I want to send private message to other forum users, but when i click on sending a new message I get " You are not allowed to send personal messages."
What to do?

item.title: How to private message other users
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
related:

  • Contact - Whonix chapter Private Communications Policy in Whonix wiki
  • Contact - Whonix chapter Encrypted Communications Policy in Whonix wiki

Read full topic
item.source: How to private message other users

item.title: How to private message other users
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No way. A long time ago we decided to disable it to stop abuse.

Best you can do is asking in public thread for other users contact info.

Read full topic
item.source: How to private message other users
